headline: Flexibility At The UPC Enables Hard Copy Intervention Filing
summary: The UPC has continued to show flexibility with its approach to the CMS, with a Panel exercising its discretion to allow the filing of a hard copy of an intervention. The UPC Rules of Procedure state...
